plot: Charlie's Mom tells him she has cancer. The gang tries to help her out, each in their own way. Meanwhile, Frank thinks his mind may be slipping.

After Charlie finds out his mom has lung cancer, he and the gang all start a fund raiser to raise money to pay for a treatment which will apparently cure Charlie's mom of her cancer. While at the same time, the gang seems to be wary of the doctor known as Dr. Jinx.—James Hake
